sentence.Network_en: The auditor has questioned the legality of the contracts.

sentence.Network_en: They intended to challenge the legality of his claim in the courts.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们打算在法庭上对他的要求的合法性提出质疑。

sentence.Network_en: The government does not recognize the legality of this court.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府不承认这个法庭的合法性.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French légalité or medieval Latin legalitas 'relating to the law', from Latin legalis (see legal)

entry.def: If you talk about the legality of an action or situation, you are talking about whether it is legal or not.

example.ex: The auditor has questioned the legality of the contracts.
example.tran: 审计员质疑这些合同是否合法。

means.word_mean: 1. lawfulness by virtue of conformity to a legal statute
